name: Puzzle Sisters Foer
description: A interactive question answering game, every one who can type could upload his own questions.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GPU 1GB Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: Windows 7/8/10 (32bit/64bit) Graphics: GPU 2GB
